fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Fortified: The first time you empty your hand, draw 5 cards immediately. Cannot activate if you already used Supplies in this phase. 
- Descry: Learn how far on the playerlist the first true Order is away from you. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reconstitute: Pick two cards in your hand. Discard them and draw 2 cards. [Infinite, 2 CD] 
- Build: Reforge a card. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Supplies: Duplicate 3 random non-special cards in your hand, excluding modifiers. Cannot be used in the same phase if Fortified activated. [1 use, Unique]
